channel.title: >>.shopkeeper.<<
channel.description: Hey guys, I had a 508 server, but now i have a 317, but on the 317 i have a problem,,, Where do i change on a 317 what the shopkeerpers sell//where they are located? i know how to change coords, but i only wanna know is how to change / locate ty,

item.title: >>.shopkeeper.<<
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

If I understand you correctly (Little hard to read what your saying, proof read next time) You want to know where to change what a shop sells and how to change were the shop is located.

So to the first part, you can change what the shop sells in Shops.CFG, this is located in the Config folder in 317 servers. Search for the shop ID and then you can add items and how many you want, if you need more help with that just tell me. But then for the location of the shop you would go in autospawn.CFG and search for the npcs ID and change it there. Tell me if you need anymore help.

Read full topic
